price: Atij i përket sundimi i qiejve dhe i Tokës; tek Allahu do të kthehet gjithçka!
arabic: لَّهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
